nodes.documentation:
@dev ERC-1155 with native metatransaction methods. These additional functions allow users
     to presign function calls and allow third parties to execute these on their behalf
 * Note: This contract is identical to the ERC1155Meta.sol contract,
      except for the ERC1155PackedBalance parent contract.

devdoc.details: ERC-1155 with native metatransaction methods. These additional functions allow users     to presign function calls and allow third parties to execute these on their behalf * Note: This contract is identical to the ERC1155Meta.sol contract,      except for the ERC1155PackedBalance parent contract.

params._owner: The address of the token holder

balanceOf(address,uint256).return: The _owner's balance of the Token type requested

params._ids: ID of the Tokens (sorted ids will lead to less gas usage
params._owners: The addresses of the token holders (sorted owners will lead to less gas usage)

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).return: The _owner's balance of the Token types requested (i.e. balance for each (owner, id) pair)

getIDBinIndex(uint256).return: (Bin number, ID"s index within that bin)

params._signer: Address to query signature nonce for

params._binValues: uint256 containing the balances of IDS_PER_UINT256 ids
params._index: Index at which to retrieve amount

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: True if the operator is approved, false if not

isValidSignature(address,bytes32,bytes,b.details: Verifies that a hash has been signed by the given signer.

params._data: Full EIP-712 data structure that was hashed and signed
params._hash: Hash of the EIP-712 encoded data
params._sig: Proof that the hash has been signed by signer.     For non wallet signatures, _sig is expected to be an array tightly encoded as     (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType)
params._signerAddress: Address that should have signed the given hash.

isValidSignature(address,bytes32,bytes,b.return: True if the address recovered from the provided signature matches the input signer address.

params._data: Encodes a meta transfer indicator, signature, gas payment receipt and extra transfer data  _data should be encoded as (  (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType),  (GasReceipt g, ?bytes transferData) )  i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array
params._isGasFee: Whether gas is reimbursed to executor or not

params._data: Encodes a meta transfer indicator, signature, gas payment receipt and extra transfer data  _data should be encoded as (  (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType),  (GasReceipt g, ?bytes transferData) )  i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array
params._isGasFee: Whether gas is reimbursed to executor or not

params._approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params._data: Encodes signature and gas payment receipt  _data should be encoded as (    (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType),    (GasReceipt g)  )  i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array
params._isGasFee: Whether gas will be reimbursed or not, with vlid signature
params._operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators
params._owner: Address that wants to set operator status  _spender

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.details: Arrays should be sorted so that all ids in a same storage slot are adjacent (more efficient)

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`
Additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`

params._approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params._operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators

params._interfaceID: The interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165

balanceOf(address,uint256).notice: Get the balance of an account's Tokens

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).notice: Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs

getIDBinIndex(uint256).notice: Return the bin number and index within that bin where ID is

getNonce(address).notice: Returns the current nonce associated with a given address

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Queries the approval status of an operator for a given owner

metaSafeBatchTransferFrom(address,addres.notice: Allows anyone with a valid signature to transfer multiple types of tokens on the bahalf of _from

metaSafeTransferFrom(address,address,uin.notice: Allows anyone with a valid signature to transfer _amount amount of a token _id on the bahalf of _from

metaSetApprovalForAll(address,address,bo.notice: Approve the passed address to spend on behalf of _from if valid signature is provided

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.notice: Send multiple types of Tokens from the _from address to the _to address (with safety call)

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Transfers amount amount of an _id from the _from address to the _to address specified

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable approval for a third party ("operator") to manage all of caller's tokens

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Query if a contract implements an interface
